theoryTitle: Duval's Identity and Connection to Sanji
theoryText: After Episode 386 aired, fans speculated about why Duval wore an iron mask and harbored such intense hatred for the Straw Hats. Many theories emerged about his connection to 'the man who ruined his life,' with speculation ranging from him being a former rival of one of the crew members to having a connection to past events. The mystery of his identity and the reason for the iron mask generated significant discussion in the fan community.

When Episode 386 revealed that Camie's fish-man friend who runs a takoyaki shop is an octopus fish-man, manga readers and attentive anime watchers theorized this would be Hatchan from the Arlong Pirates returning as a reformed character. The theory suggested Oda was setting up a redemption arc for a former villain, showing character growth and the theme of forgiveness in One Piece.
